recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with a rich tomato-based meat sauce.
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add chopped onions and minced garlic, sauté until fragrant.
Add ground beef, cook until browned.
Stir in canned tomatoes, tomato paste, red wine, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, and pepper.
Simmer the sauce for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti in a separate pot according to package instructions.
Serve the spaghetti with the Bolognese sauce, topped with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a creamy and aromatic tomato-based sauce.
directions: In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, and Tikka Masala spice mix.
Marinate chicken pieces in the mixture for at least 1 hour.
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat.
Add chopped onions and minced garlic, sauté until softened.
Add marinated chicken pieces, cook until browned.
Stir in diced tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add heavy cream and salt, simmer for an additional 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan bread.

recipes.title: Mansaf
recipes.description: A delicious dip made from mashed avocados, tomatoes, onions, and lime juice.
directions: Cut avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh into a bowl.
Mash the avocados with a fork until desired consistency.
Add diced tomatoes, chopped red onion, minced jalapeño, and chopped cilantro to the bowl.
Mix in lime juice and season with salt and pepper.
Serve with tortilla chips and enjoy!
